sentences.english: Please mix sugar and cream fifty-fifty.
sentences.chinese: 请把砂糖和奶油对半参加。

sentences.english: Yes, thanks. Please mix sugar and cream fifty-fifty.
sentences.chinese: 好的，谢谢，请把砂糖和奶油对半加入。

sentences.english: An analysis was carried out on the structure of walking mechanism of semi-walking mobile robot.
sentences.chinese: 对半步行移动机器人行走机构的结构进行了分析。

sentences.english: And. a computer program about the method of elimination is worked out in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 水文对半带宽消元法拟出电算程序。
